segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for cologne , small bottle . Can I see that one in the glass shelf ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course , this one costs 260 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you think it's expensive . You can look at this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the difference between the two ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's difficult to explain . But this one is really cheap .
segments.speaker: S1
